content:
During the day, there were 76 fighting collisions on the battlefield.

About thisinformsThe General Staff of the Armed Forces.

In Kupyansk directionDefense forces reflects 3 enemy attacks in the area of Tabaivka of Kharkiv region. Under artillery and mortar fire were more than 20 settlements, including Western, Sinkivka, Stepova Novoselivka, Kotlyarivka of Kharkiv region. -

In the estuary directionOur warriors reflects 7 enemy attacks in the areas of the settlements of Bigorivka of Luhansk region and Tern, a controversial Donetsk region, where the enemy, with the support of aviation, tried to break through the defense of our troops. The enemy struck an aviation strike in the area of the settlement of Yampolivka of Donetsk region. About 15 settlements were injured from artillery and mortar shelling, including Makeevka, Bigorivka, Luhansk region and Tern, Yampolivka, Thornske, Serebryanka, Donetsk region.

In the Bakhmut directionDefense forces reflected 11 enemy attacks in areas of settlements Ivanivske, Klyshchiyivka, Andriyivka, Donetsk region, where the enemy tried to improve his tactical position. The enemy struck aviation in areas of settlements Bogdanivka, Stupochka and New York of Donetsk region. Also under artillery and mortar fire were more than 10 settlements, including Grigorivka, the times of Yar, Klyshchiyivka and Andreevka of Donetsk region.

In the Avdiivsky directionOur defenders reflects 20 enemy attacks in the areas of Berdichi settlements, Tonenko, Pervomaisko, Nevelskoye Donetsk region. The enemy struck in the areas of settlements Pokrovsk, Netaylovo, Donetsk region. About 15 settlements, among them Novobakhmutivka, Berdychi, Pervomaisk and Nevelsk Donetsk region, have experienced artillery and mortar shelling of the enemy.

In the Novopavlovsky directionThe forces of defense continue to restrain the enemy in the areas of settlements of St. George, Vage, Novomikhailivka, Donetsk region, where the enemy, with the support of aviation, tried to break through the defense of our troops 18 times. The enemy also struck in areas of settlements of Krasnogorivka, Vodyane, Urozhizhny Donetsk region. Under the artillery and mortar fire of the invaders were more than 20 settlements, including Krasnogorivka, St. George, Paraskovivka, Village of Donetsk region.

In the Orikhiv directionThe enemy made 4 unsuccessful attacks in the area of the settlement of the robot of the Zaporozhye region. The enemy struck aviation blows in the areas of settlements of Staromayorsk Donetsk region and Novodarivka, Chervonovo Zaporizhzhya region. More than 15 settlements, Malynivka, Magic, Belogorya, Novodanilovka, and Pyatykhatki, Zaporizhzhya Region, have experienced artillery and mortar shelling.
